These Statues are part of the memory game during the Recruitment Drive quest. It is one of the tests before becoming an initiate Temple Knight. The statues can be recognized by their colour and the weapon they are wearing:

  • Famous warriors wear battleaxes.
  • Ancient warriors wear halberts.
  • Famous White Knights wear two-handed swords.
  • Ancient White Knights wear maces.

During the memory game, all but one of the statues is shown for slightly more than 10 seconds in a randomized arrangement. After the time is up, the statues will be placed back orderly, and you have to touch the statue that was missing.

These '''Statues''' are part of the memory game during the [[Recruitment Drive]] quest. It is one of the tests before becoming an initiate [[Temple Knight]]. The statues can be recognized by their colour and the weapon they are wearing:

* Famous warriors wear [[battleaxe]]s.
* Ancient warriors wear [[halbert]]s.
* Famous White Knights wear [[two-handed sword]]s.
* Ancient White Knights wear [[mace]]s.

During the memory game, all but one of the statues is shown for slightly more than 10 seconds in a randomized arrangement. After the time is up, the statues will be placed back orderly, and you have to touch the statue that was missing.

{{Recruitment Drive}}
